sub_title: Research Scientist at Frederick S. Pardee Center for International Futures
summary: Impact driven environmental scientist. Works at the interplay of research and environmental policy advice. Interested in local, regional and global environmental issues integrating nature conservation, sustainability and economic goals. Previous academic training (PhD) on EU policies to protect and restore land for multiple ecosystem services, agriculture and biodiversity. 2-years work experience as policy advisor to UNCCD on global environmental issues related to land degradation and opportunities for restoration. Experience in report writing, publishing scientific articles, book chapters. Communication of findings with stakeholders (farmers, policy makers). Coordination of project teams, teaching and other outreach.

certifications.name: Training van inhoud naar impact (From content to Impact)

projects.title: Future of Food Security (USAID Resilience and Food Security)

contributors.headline: Research Scientist at Frederick S. Pardee Center for International Futures

projects.title: Protected area management for biodiversity and ecosystem services in the EU
projects.description:
Research project on prioritizing land for biodiversity and ecosystem services. We will identify priority areas across the EU using Zonation software for "Nature for Nature", "Nature for Culture" and "Nature for humans". 
Output will be a scientific article and a policy advice towards IPBES

contributors.headline: Research Scientist at Frederick S. Pardee Center for International Futures

projects.title: Global peatland areas: where, status and protected area management
projects.description: Assessment of the extent of global peatland cover and the rate of conversion of peatland to agricultural land. Scenario on the impact of peatland area protection. We assess the additional land based emissions from peatland conversion and protection (1970-2050). Output is a new module to the IMAGE model, integrated assessment model. Documentation in policy report and scientific pulbication

contributors.headline: Research Scientist at Frederick S. Pardee Center for International Futures

projects.title: Sustainable water management in agricultural areas
projects.description: Research for the UNCCD global land outlook. We use a global integrated assessment. We assess the impact of water management measures in rainfed and irrigated agriculture on production, land use and water-crop yield ratios. We use scenarios for the whole globe between 1970-2050. Output is expected to be documented in a policy report and in a scientific article

contributors.headline: Research Scientist at Frederick S. Pardee Center for International Futures

projects.title: Potential of conservation agriculture to combat global land degradation
projects.description:
Global assessment of the potential of conservation agriculture and residue management to increase soil organic carbon. Combination of literature review and computer model analysis (LPJmL, IMAGE) with scenarios on increasing residue management for the period 1970-2050.
Output will be documented in a policy document to the UNCCD and in a scientific publication

contributors.headline: Research Scientist at Frederick S. Pardee Center for International Futures

projects.title: COVID-19 and macro-economic development across 10 African nations

contributors.headline: Research Scientist at Frederick S. Pardee Center for International Futures

projects.title: Protecting ecosystem services in Europe under land use change
projects.description: We study the effect of projected changes in land management and land cover on ecosystem services in Europe. Specifically we study how priority areas for protecting ecosystem services change between today and in 2040 (under different scenarios of land use change). We show that land use change can both threaten current protected areas for ecosystem services, but that land use change (especially land abandonment and deintensification of forest management) can increase ecosystem service supply locally

contributors.headline: Research Scientist at Frederick S. Pardee Center for International Futures

projects.title: Land Use, Biodiversity and Ecosystem Services
projects.description: international research collaboration on the relation between land use, biodiversity and provisioning ecosystem services.

contributors.headline: Research Scientist at Frederick S. Pardee Center for International Futures
Professor Environmental Spatial Analysis at Institute for Environmental Studies, VU University, Amsterdam

projects.title: Natuurherstel in de Kromme Rijn
projects.description: Research project on nature conservation and restoration in a Dutch pasture landscape (Kromme Rijn). The research compares the existing nature management plan to proposed scenario's of agri-environment measures (organic farms, tree line restoration, restoration of previous agricultural land). We use a combination of spatial optimization software, scenario analysis and stakeholder workshops with farmers and policy makers

company.name: Frederick S. Pardee Center for International Futures

profile_positions.company: Frederick S. Pardee Center for International Futures
profile_positions.title: Research Scientist

profile_positions.description: Policy research on the extent of land degradation globally and the potential of restoration and sustainable land management to halt and reverse land degradation. Amongst others reports focused on global peatlands, water management in agriculture or conservation agriculture. Work will be published as part of UNCCD Global land outlook and in scientific journals. Coordination and team head of topic group on sustainable land management and restoration (8 people, junior-senior level, external partners). Experience with Integrated assessment models (IAMs) and scenario development
profile_positions.title: Policy researcher on land degradation and sustainable land management

profile_positions.description: Research on the protection and restoration of landscapes for ecosystem services and biodiversity. Specific focus on the role of human management, green infrastructure and the interactions between different units of the landscape. Experiences with both regional projects (restoration of hedgerows in Kromme Rijn) and EU-global scale (identifying priority areas for protecting ecosystem services in Europe).
profile_positions.title: PhD researcher

profile_positions.description: Master Thesis on the effect of wetland restoration in an agricultural basin. Linking hydrologic effect, optimal location, ecosystem services and stakeholder opinions
profile_positions.title: Exchange Student

profile_positions.description: together with management team responsible for daily operations in cinema Pathe Arena. Coordinating a team of 40-50 employees, responsible for daily financial administration and stock management, member of working group on hospitality, management meetings
profile_positions.title: Operations Supervisor

profile_positions.description: Organisation committee of a biennial career event for Earth scientist at the VU University Amsterdam.  Approximately 500-600 attendees, 30 companies on job market, 20 workshops and 6 key note lectures (incl. Prof. Kroonenberg and former minister Jacqueline Cramer).
profile_positions.title: Board member acquisition

profile_positions.description: Student assistant on a project focusing on the incorporation of climate change and climate change uncertainty in Dutch SCBA. Data analysis, academic writing (in English & Dutch)
profile_positions.title: Student Assistant

profile_positions.description: Modeling the effect of extreme weather on train disruptions in the Netherlands
profile_positions.title: Researcher Internship

profile_positions.description: Treasurer of the board of study association GeoVUsie. Organizing and supervising activities on a daily basis, contact with faculty board, other student associations, sponsors and carriers. Activities include Flexcursie (a week log field trip), Introduction week and weekend for new students, career event, Oktoberfest (around 500 attendees) and many more smaller scale activities
profile_positions.title: Board Treasurer
